Name: Felicita
description: Felicita is 58 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner. She works in agriculture and selling milk and in this way sustains her household and helps the family economy. Felicita asks for this loan from FUSAI to invest in constructing a passageway in her home since when it rains, the water comes in. With the amount she has requested, she will purchase galvanized metal sheets, purlins, iron, cement, sand, and bricks, etc.
